# Explore projects

In this section you explore __tercen__ public projects. Doing so will copy the uploaded data and workflow. 

* Click on `Explore`

<center><img src="images/explore_public_projects.png"></center>


* Scroll down to `tercen/crabs_tutorial`
* Click on `tercen/crabs_tutorial`

You can now see the crabs tutorial project and its files.


In the next section we learn how to  clone a public project.
